subject: Baseball
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: David Wright worked out at Citi Field for the first time in months, and the Mets formally welcomed reliever Tyler Clippard, but Mejia was suspended for 162 games after testing positive for steroids.
snippet: David Wright worked out at Citi Field for the first time in months, and the Mets formally welcomed reliever Tyler Clippard, but Mejia was suspended for 162 games after testing positive for steroids.
